spells.title: Earth Tome
spells.description: A Novice Friendly Tome For Minor Manipulation of Dirt and Stone. Note: Popular Amongst Fourth-Class Academy Scholars

spells.title: Fire Tome
spells.description: An Advanced Beginner's Perfect Tome For Flame Manipulation. Note: A Go To Tome For Mana Control Classes. Exceptionally High Skill Curve.

spells.title: Holy Tome
spells.description: A Competent Wizard's Go To Start On Deity Essence Extraction. Note: A Go To Tome For Protection And Rejuvenation Classes.

spells.title: Void Tome
spells.description: An Expert Archmage's First Textbook Over Astral Mana Starbinding and Manipulation. Note: Often Referenced and Studied By Academy Professors and Deans.

spells.title: Dark Tome
spells.description: An Unpredictable Tome For All Mages, But The Natural Next Step For Post-Grad WarPagers. Note: Hazardous And Potentially Fatal.

spells.title: Summoning Tome
spells.description: The Only Commercially Available Soulbinder For Freepagers! Note: Please Provide An Archcouncil Writ Signed In The Last 30 Days To Purchase.
